prompts: Create a blue bat-like Pokemon with stunning purple wings and a mischievous grin.
I want a Flying-type Pokemon that can be found in dark caves and has a fast, agile body.
Generate an image of a small, winged Pokemon with bright colors and a playful personality.
Make a design for a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas, featuring unique wing patterns.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that uses echolocation, with a sleek shape and vibrant colors.
Show me a Pokemon with a combination of blue and purple shades, known for its swift movements.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a bat, with distinctive features that make it stand out in the wild.
